title: Chairperson Welcomes Appointment of New President of the Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia, Commends Tenure of Former President Zewde | African Union
snippet: The Chairperson further reiterates the continued support of the African Union Commission to the Federal Democratic Republic of Ethiopia's journey to deepen the country’s democracy and sustainable development. ... title: President of Ethiopia - Wikipedia
snippet: The president of Ethiopia is the head of state of Ethiopia. The position is largely ceremonial with executive power vested in the Council of Ministers chaired by the prime minister. The current president is Taye Atske Selassie, who took office on 7 October 2024.

title: Ethiopia's new president: Taye Atske Selassie replaces Sahle-Work Zewde
snippet: The replacement of Sahle-Work means that Tanzania's President Samia Suluhu Hassan is currently Africa's only female head of state. Ethiopia festival fires burn bright despite downpour

title: New Ethiopian President Extends A Hand | Global Finance Magazine
snippet: As a close ally of Abiy, Taye risks blemishing his reputation in taking up the largely ceremonial role of president, according to Abdalla Ahmed Ibrahim, director at the East Africa Center for Research and Strategic Studies in Nairobi. But he also has the credentials needed to argue that the Abiy’s government now wants to extend a hand to its rivals at home and abroad, “promoting national unity and international relations,” Ibrahim adds. Internally, Ethiopia is grappling with ethnic tensions.

title: Ethiopia: New president signals willingness to dialogue
snippet: The veteran diplomat replaced the first female president, Sahle-Work Zewde, who fell out with Prime Minister Abiy. ... Ethiopia's former foreign minister Taye Atske Selassie, has taken up the largely ceremonial role of president after parliamentary ...
